title: The Directorate Coup Fails
outcome: With the BCI and Halden-Index silent, Directorate loyalists enact a plan to restore order through force. They seize old surveillance routines, manipulate compliance patrols, and round up dissenters. Innovator engineers and citizens resist, using sabotage tactics learned from the previously invisible population. After three weeks of escalating conflict, public evidence reveals Directorate's power play was built on forged data and backdoor manipulation, overturning attempts at authoritarian revival and igniting a city-wide call for direct democracy.

events.description: Directorate leaders reactivate former BCI compliance patrols and old surveillance routines to intimidate dissenters and assert control.
Innovator engineers and citizens disrupt patrols using sabotage techniques developed by the 'invisible' population. Tensions between factions escalate.
Directorate stages public roundups, sparking street protests and neighborhood barricades. Civil unrest spreads quickly to multiple districts.
Citizens, supported by Innovator engineers, expose Directorate's forged compliance data and secret backdoor access. The truth goes viral, undermining Directorate authority.
Public outrage overturns the Directorate's coup. Massive citizen assemblies demand direct voting for leadership, ending attempts at authoritarian revival.
